name: Spherical Adventure: Speed-Run Edition (badvErtical)
description:
Do you like speed-run & parkour?!

I can't offer you that, however, you should definitely try badvErtical! It's an interesting but a little disturbing spherical-adventure. There will be teleports and many secrets that you have to explore in order to finish the game, and ofc some intentional bugs so that this all doesn't seem too easy.  I would love to see people speed-run badvErtical.
